title: Trump, GOP face test in Miami mayor runoff: Meet the candidates
shortDescription: The fight to fill Miami’s mayoral office comes to a head on Tuesday evening during a special runoff election that has high stakes for national politics

title: Trump hits the road again to talk up the economy on Pennsylvania trip
shortDescription: Trump's speech Dec. 9 at the Mount Airy Casino Resort in Mount Pocono comes as Republicans struggle with their response to affordability concerns.

title: ICEBlock creator sues Trump administration for app's removal
shortDescription: ICEBlock developer Joshua Aaron said administration officials made "unconstitutional threats and demands against Apple" that led to the app's removal.

title: Trump reacts to Habba resignation
shortDescription: Habba's resignation is the latest blow to Trump and his Justice Department as they seek to install loyalists to oversee key U.S. attorney's offices.

title: Firebrand Jasmine Crockett launches run for US Senate in Texas
shortDescription: The Dallas-area lawmaker announced her U.S. Senate run Dec. 8. She's expected to face off in a competitive Democratic primary with James Talarico.

title: First Lady Melania Trump flies with Santa to Toys for Tots event
shortDescription: In her message to little ones around the country, Melania Trump said Toys for Tots is 'one of the most beloved traditions of the holiday season.'

title: Trump announces $12 billion farm aid package
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced $12 billion in farm aid, most of which will go to row-crop farmers.

title: Judge orders ICE to release woman tied to top Trump spokesperson
shortDescription: Bruna Caroline Ferreira is the mother of White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt’s nephew. Homeland Security accused her of overstaying her visa.

title: Trump slams 60 Minutes MTG interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump slammed CBS for their 60 Minutes interview with Marjorie Taylor Greene.

title: Proceeds from $2,800 purse going to Melania Trump's foster initiative
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump has focused on helping the foster care system. AGFC, a luxury company by a Gucci heiress, will donate purse proceeds to it.

title: Former Trump lawyer Alina Habba resigns as US attorney for New Jersey
shortDescription: Alina Habba says she is resigning as the top federal prosecutor in New Jersey after an appeals court ruled she was unlawfully serving the role.

title: Melania Trump visits children at holiday charity drive on Marine base
shortDescription: Melania Trump visits a Toys for Tots charity drive with children of service members at Marine Corps Base Quantico on Dec. 8, 2025.

title: Report says Trump did same 'mortgage fraud' he accuses his targets of
shortDescription: President Donald Trump engaged in a similar arrangement to what he has called potentially criminal "mortgage fraud," according to a ProPublica report.

title: The SCOTUS case that will decide Trump's power
shortDescription: The Supreme Court hears a case that will decide President Donald Trump's power over federal agencies.

title: What Marjorie Taylor Greene said about Trump in '60 Minutes' interview
shortDescription: The controversial Georgia representative who severed ties with Donald Trump defended her move to leave office in a '60 Minutes' interview.

title: Donald Trump slams CBS over Marjorie 'Traitor' Greene interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump slammed "60 Minutes" and Lesley Stahl for an interview featuring Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, who he calls a "traitor."

title: Trump is signing an order on federal AI rules. Here's why.
shortDescription: All 50 states and DC have introduced AI legislation this year, with 38 states adopting around 100 measures in 2025.

title: Trump in 'Home Alone 2' was one of many cameos before his political rise
shortDescription: President Donald Trump made a number of TV and movie appearances before getting involved in politics. See his role in "Home Alone 2: Lost in New York"

title: MTG talks MAGA fallout, Trump at Kennedy Honors
shortDescription: Marjorie Taylor Greene talks fallout with Trump and MAGA. Also, the president takes center stage at the Kennedy Center.

title: Gov. Tim Walz daughter fires back at Trump over 'R' slur in TikTok post
shortDescription: "Calling my dad what he did has unleashed a (multi-expletive) storm," Hope Walz said. "I have people DMing me saying absolutely horrendous things."
